active_learning.discussion_prompt: In the context of NIST SP 800-161r1, debate whether integration testing alone is sufficient to mitigate supply chain risks in system components, or if additional C-SCRM practices are necessary. Provide examples of risks that emerge only at integration (e.g., counterfeit components or configuration mismatches) and counterarguments based on real-world breaches.

active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
